Established in 2000, Atrilogy Solutions Group, Inc. provides organizations of all sizes with high-quality, cost effective information technology (IT), business process staffing and consulting services. Our industry-leading service model combines experienced project managers with seasoned technical and functional consultants to eliminate client uncertainty and deliver superior value and results.Clients turn to Atrilogy for expertise in: • IT staffing and placement (Java, JavaScript, Full-Stack Engineers, Automation Engineers, DevOps, Developers in Test, NoSQL DBA’s etc.)• Agile Consulting Services (SCRUM Masters, Coaches, Product Owners)• Creative (Interactive Project Manager/Art Director, Information Architect, UI/UX Designer,    Web/Graphic Design) Atrilogy has been recognized by CRN magazine as one of the nation’s fastest-growing IT solution providers and by Inc. magazine as one of the nation’s fastest-growing privately held companies. Based in Irvine, California, Atrilogy also has offices in Denver, Phoenix and Atlanta. We deliver the right process, the right technology and the right people, with outstanding customer service.

I focused on delivering an equal experience of sales and customer service to a range of clients. I was a  leader in sales and customer experience due to my years of experience and consistent performance. It was my primary focus to attend to our customers needs. From the moment I started interacting with clients, it was our responsibility to ensure they felt valued. It was crucial to service the clients needs/complaints of their T-Mobile service as well as introducing them to new T-Mobile products & services they are unaware of that could benefit them in their everyday life.

Erick was my recruiter, and he gave a lot more effort to find me a job, than any other recruiter I was working with. He followed up consistently, and found me a Contract within 2 weeks. The contract led into the full time position I have currently at SkyTouch as a Software Test Engineer. He was very good at checking in and making sure everything was going well at SkyTouch. We also met up with each other for lunch once in awhile. I think Erick is a great person to work with, and I highly recommend using him as a Technical Recruiter.
